title: Land for LUXURY RESIDENCES or APARTMENTS in Dehiwala
details:
DEHIWALA 22 Perches in a residential locality with a demand for Apartment Complexes. Also suitable for Luxury Residences. Permitted to go up to 6 Floors!

Served by 2 Main Roads and 2nd Block from the Main Road.

Clear Partition Title, acceptable for Bank Funding.

Rs 2.75 M per perch, negotiable.

Call 0094772280690 for more particulars.
